# playgroundDescription

**Instance Property**

A description of the feature extractor in a playground.

## Declaration

```swift
var playgroundDescription: Any { get }
```

## Describing a feature extractor type

- **description**: A text representation of a feature extractor type.
- **debugDescription**: A text representation of the feature extractor that’s suitable for output during debugging.
